title: Installation Problem
body:
When I install the ALPHA client, near the end of the installation I get the error

Error copying file from
C:/RADS/projects/league_client/releases/installer/deploy/LeagueClient.exe to C:/
:Destination not writable

I don't know how to fix this issue

replies.body:
Make sure that you are installing the client in the same location as the existing League folder.

{{champion:17}}
Clear space on your C drive or try installing it to a USB. Also make sure to run as admin.
